022f6b1e-dee1-4844-93ef-8391c8934a28.race_name: Come Watch Rugby Final At Turffontein 28 October Maiden Plate (F & M)

race_form.race_comment: UNITED WE STAND (1) should have finished closer to the winner last time as she was squeezed at the 400m mark. The manner in which she finishes off her races suggests that she will love the rise to 1800m. With some better luck this time, she can get the job done. SOLO DIVA (2) has some good recent form lines to her credit. She should have no issues with the drop to 1800m and S'manga Khumalo may be able to coax that little bit extra out of her where it matters most. AZALEAS FOR ALL (5) raced from a handy position last start but had to settle for second place. It must be noted that the horse that finished third that day has come out and won since. She is in a good space and another honest effort is on the cards. CRYSTAL MAIDEN (6) finished fifth in the same race as the third choice last time out after setting the pace. She might be better off ridden with cover and she is worth another chance at odds.

race_form.race_comment: CHINA PANDA (1) has been settling off the speed lately, finishing fourth (17.70) last time in a Grade 5 at this track. The form from her last run stacks up well. Bold showing expected. BRACTON (3) produced a moderate effort last time when eighth at this track over 297m behind Raven Classified (17.96) in a Grade 4. Has ability and can atone. OPAL MAGIC (7) should be thereabouts after filling a top-three spot most recently.

OPAL MAGIC (7) should be thereabouts after filling a top-three spot most recently.

race_form.race_comment: SAVANA LAKE (3) has a strong winning strike-rate over this track and trip with two wins and a placing from four tries. Scored by one length last time (24.53) in an A3 over 388m at this track. Looks a leading chance on best. BRONSON (2) missed the hat-trick last start when third and beaten 2.75 lengths (24.52) last time at this track. Expected to feature again. LOCKED OUT (5) finished fifth last time at this track but could not have been more impressive before that in her dominant 24.07 win at this track over 388m. Has the ability and looks a key chance. SIGNATURE HARRY (6) was a huge winner last start. Must be respected.

SIGNATURE HARRY (6) was a huge winner last start. Must be respected.

race_form.race_comment: PATTYS KALAMAZOO (1) was the fastest winner on the program last time out, running away to score by 2.5 lengths (16.59) at this track. Hard to go past. DARVER NINETYSIX (3) put in a much better performance last start when in the placings at this track behind NO MORE HOLLY (16.74) in a D3. Expected to be in this for a long way. THATSUPTOYOU (4) last start finished 3rd in a D3 on October 19 over 280m at this track behind Tammen Ella beaten 2.75 lengths (16.71). Can hit the frame with the right run. NO MORE HOLLY (2) can add to a nice sequence of wins.

race_form.race_comment: FARAH (2) debuted finishing 11L fourth in the 3600m Listed Prix Finot at Auteuil. Could prove hard to beat. THE FAVOURITE (1) pulled up at Dieppe and left that behind when 3L third over 3500m at Moulins. Bold show expected. Choeur du Nord filly NORDICA DEBELAIR (11) rates highly debuting for a top stable. SIRIMA (9) is another to consider wearing first time cheekpieces following a 14L fourth tackling 3550m here.

THE FAVOURITE (1) pulled up at Dieppe and left that behind when 3L third over 3500m at Moulins. Bold show expected. Choeur du Nord filly NORDICA DEBELAIR (11) rates highly debuting for a top stable. SIRIMA (9) is another to consider wearing first time cheekpieces following a 14L fourth tackling 3550m here.

race_form.race_comment: SILVERSIDE SKYE (4) latest effort finished 3rd on October 19 over 500m at this track behind Millroad Zara beaten 4 lengths (30.71) in an A5. Looks well placed and should feature. UNIQUE ARCTURUS (3) turned in a fair 4th placed finish last time at this track over 500m (31.01). Has ability and a bold showing is expected. RODDICKS BLUE (2) had been racing in honest fashion recording two placings in a row before finishing fifth (31.51) at this track latest. Has ability and can measure up. FOLLOWTHE BARRIE (5) was well fancied in betting last start but could only manage a nose away in second (31.14). Ready to find winning form.

ccff387c-df6a-4bdd-91eb-ecb5b0521266.race_name: Fundraisers At Angle Park (N/P) Stake Cta Division

race_form.race_comment: IT'S SMUDGY (5) has a strong record this trip with 23 wins and 15 placings from 59 starts. Comes off a (30.69) win last time, scoring by a nose in a NG over 525m at Broken Hill. Has the ability and looks a key chance here. PSYCHOTIC BABE (2) turned in a moderate run last time when fifth at this track over 530m behind Where's Poppy (31.05) in a Grade 5. Was in the money the start prior. Has performed well from this box with a win and seven minor placings to her name from 12 starts. Likely to be about the money. SPRING HARBOUR (7) copped a check in the run and finished a well held 7 lengths fourth (31.27) last time in a Special conditions race at this track over 530m. Has the ability and looks a key chance. WEBLEC WAVE (1) is a last-start placegetter worth considering.

race_form.race_comment: MRS. MUSGRAVE (3) is better than last start when fifth (31.06) in a OPEN at this track over 520m. Better than the latest run and deserves another chance. JAMESON BAY (9) boasts a consistent overall record including nine wins from 40 starts, but missed the frame latest when sixth (30.74) over 520m at Albion Park. Solid record at the distance winning three races. Has the ability and rates a key chance this line-up. SIRIUS LILLY (1) will need to run right up to last start to feature again.

Solid record at the distance winning three races. Has the ability and rates a key chance this line-up. SIRIUS LILLY (1) will need to run right up to last start to feature again.

race_form.race_comment: MEENAMOYNAMONA (5) clocked a new course and distance PB last time, finishing a half a length second behind VINEGARHILL BEAR in 28.51. Expected to go close if runs up to latest. SALACRES JANE (2) broke from the inside draw and filled a minor placing last start, beaten only 0.8 lengths (28.01) behind Muxton Rufus at this track. Well placed and gets her chance. VINEGARHILL BEAR (3) has a fair record and proved too classy last time to win by half a length at this track in a handy 28.47 beating MEENAMOYNAMONA. Can make it back-to-back wins. SALACRES GAMBINO (6) can feature with the right run.
